      • execute

        public void execute()
             throws IllegalMoveStateException
        execute executes the move trade, which means that the player's to be traded blocks, will be removed from his hand and will be filled with new blocks.
        Specified by:
        execute in class Move
        Throws:
        IllegalMoveStateException - if move is not valid

      • validate

        public boolean validate(Player p,
                        boolean firstMove)
        validate checks whether the trade move is valid or not. the method checks if it's the firstMove of the player the method checks if the given player as parameter is the same as the player the method checks if the player has the blocks
        Specified by:
        validate in class Move
        firstMove - tells it is the firstMove of the game or not
        Returns:
        true if all the checks are true.
